title: 多人游戏进不去..这贴跪求大神解答.
author: ddv酱
txt_content:
今天进多人游戏还行，就是突然卡住然后代码。接着我重开就出现了这个




QQ截图20130823220300.jpg (20.59 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2013-8-23 22:06 上传





（进多人游戏服务器一秒就断开连接，密码都没输入）。还有进游戏一秒如果移动一点也会代码如下.




boom.jpg (36.78 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2013-8-23 22:02 上传




详情如下.

  Minecraft has crashed!

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Ticking entity
A full error report has been saved to F:\EC-15 #6\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-08-23_22.09.46-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(
